entry.title: User/Organization sites in GitHub Pages using fastpages

link.title: User/Organization sites in GitHub Pages using fastpages

entry.summary: Previously, GitHub only allowed user/project sites to set the repository default branch as their publishing source. This was the main reason why fastpages could not be used to create user/project sites, as its automation deployment uses the gh-pages branch instead.
